result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: Data Management Plan will describe the data management life cycle for the data to be collected processed andor generated by SophiA The DMP will ensure research data is findable accessible interoperable and reusable FAIR including information such as the handling of research data during and after the project how data will be collected processed andor generated the methodology and standards to be used if data will be shared or made open access and how data will be curated and preserved
